id.description: The unique identifier (UUID) of this profile attribute type

type.description: The type of this object - always `profile_attribute_types`

profile_attribute_category.description: Category is the section in the Create Move form that a profile attribute appears in, e.g. Health or Risks

user_type.description: Profile attribute types can be applied to certain user types such as Police or Prison staff or to everybody (indicated by a null value)

alert_type.description: The NOMIS alert type for this profile attribute type

alert_code.description: The NOMIS alert code for this profile attribute type

description.description: The label displayed on the Create Move form for this profile attribute type
